concept.title: Temperature and Pressure Valve Discharge Pipe

conbody.p: This water heater is provided by the manufacturer with a properly-rated/sized and certified combination temperature - pressure (T&P) relief valve. See for information on replacement and other requirements.

Install a discharge pipe between the T&P-valve discharge opening and a suitable floor drain. Do not connect discharge piping directly to the drain unless an air gap of is provided. To prevent bodily injury, hazard to life, or property damage, the relief valve must be allowed to discharge water in adequate quantities if circumstances demand. If the discharge pipe is not connected to a drain or other suitable means, the water flow can cause property damage.
